Name: Radijs
Review Text: The staff were really friendly and efficient. Their terrace is really cosy as you have the canal view. I had a veggie burger which was really delicious.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: The place is awesome, delicious food, friendly staff, cozy atmosphere and very good prices. ‚Ä¶

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Great neighborhood caf√©/pub! Yummy food and coffee, friendly and accomodating service. They aren't very strict with opening hours so double-check with them in person rather than relying on the hours posted online.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Best enjoyed in the summer! Go down the stairs and chill out with a Weizen beer at the water side terrace. They got classic cafe food, serving burgers, steaks and some vega options. Only downside, inside it might smell a bit like the extractor from the open kitchen.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: The snacks are very tasty, and there is a decent variety of beers from the tap (ie: oedipus or Browerij't ij). The cheesecake and the chocolate volcano were from other world! The location is great, as it is next to a really lovely channel, typical postcard of Amsterdam. The prices are average, this is Amsterdam and won't be cheap...

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Awesome food, great staff and absolutely fair prices. 5/5, worth a visit. Quite full in the evening so bring some time (15-30 minutes) to wait at their bar or make a reservation

Name: Radijs
Review Text:
We order a cheese Board priced at ‚Ç¨9.50 and received a two old, broken cheese with some brown sauce. One of them was blue cheese.
Disappointing. ‚Ä¶

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Nice place next to the beautiful Admiralengracht canal, nice coffee and food with a good selection of beers, a bit expensive in my opinion but almost everywhere in Amsterdam is expensive.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Great breakfast place. Had the eggs beney, with freshly squeezed oj. Busy little intersection great place to sit and relax with a coffee. Service was friendly and pleasant.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Some staff are friendly some need to be educated. I mean when you cannot tell what wines you have or what food to recommend you need to go back to learn the basics. The waitress who served us did not pay much attention. We got our food before any cutlery was put on the table.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Good food, fairly priced, right by the canal. I had a chicken-bacon-avocado sandwich and the tomato soup.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: A lovely locals joint (all are welcome, even me) . The food is a modern European take on great grub. The staff are attentive and fun, what more do you want. Oh, great beer üç∫ and I assume they have the finest tap water in Holland. Tip: Describe the atmosphere

Name: Radijs
Review Text: One of the beter terraces in west Amsterdam. Portions are nice and big!

Name: Radijs
Review Text: A big 'thank you' to the friendly staff for accommodating a family of six between reservations! The food was well prepared and flavourful. Unfortunately the French fries / chips ordered by three of us were overcooked (too hard). But I would be happy to return on my next visit to Amsterdam!

Name: Radijs
Review Text: It is a really nice place. But after spend almost 300‚Ç¨ in 2 weeks(2 person) I expected free shots in the last visit. They recognized us although they were reluctant to invite us to 2 shots üò©

Name: Radijs
Review Text: This place was recommended to me by a local and it did not disappoint. I came here on a Sunday for their brunch menu.  The restaurant has an open kitchen view and a nice little bar area.  Plenty of sitting inside or you can sit outside if ‚Ä¶

Name: Radijs
Review Text: The food was really good and I was very happy with it. The part I didn't like about this place was the long wait for the staff to even come to our table to ask if what we wanted. Took ages to just get the bill when we were done. Other than this, it was a nice place.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: A warm and friendly atmosphere, due to the not too spacious, living room like interior and the ever-friendly staff. ‚Ä¶

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Passing by this place I went in to vht their menu and was greeted by a friendly, polite server. He explained the menu options, specials, and offered a place for our luggage.    No hard sell. We sat down and ordered food which arrived ‚Ä¶

Name: Radijs
Review Text: It's a great place to go after work. Burgers are juicy and tasty. The staff is very friendly and knowledgeable about their beers, although the selection is small. ‚Ä¶

Name: Radijs
Review Text: The quality of food changed depended on which cooks were working. However, there were days where we've had amazing food! Service in general was universally slow/poor though, but allows you to enjoy the sun/canals more. Probably not a place to go to if you're in a rush.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: My new favourite local! Super friendly and chill üòäüëåü¶Ñ

Name: Radijs
Review Text:
A fun and friendly local bar and restaurant.
This place serves fresh, simple soul food and it does so with aplomb. There's a small but interesting selection of beer and wine, an open kitchen and upbeat bar ‚Ä¶

Name: Radijs
Review Text:
This is a charming little place with a real stripped back feel.

The menu is simple and comprehensive - it's 'modern' cuisine without a ‚Ä¶

Name: Radijs
Review Text:
One of my favorite bars in Amsterdam. You can sit by the canals and enjoy your beer.
Good burgers and really friendly staffs.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Great caf√©, and a perfect spot in summer as they have the waterfront, just down the steps. Could fast become a Sunday tradition if you love in the West. Service is usually pretty good too, a rarity in Amsterdam.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Nice place, good snacks and drinks. Lovely atmosphere. Staff are a bit hit and miss but generally very good. Some days it feels like you are being rushed out, other times they are very warm and funny.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: A decent place for drinks and food, they have a good variety. They should invest however in a proper ventilation system, when they cook fish, all the smell sits inside the place...

Name: Radijs
Review Text:
Our neighborhood-bar-restaurant-cafe...

Luckily Radijs is only 100 meters away from our home. This spot is located next ‚Ä¶

Name: Radijs
Review Text: One of the best sun drenched terraces in the West. Get your tan in while indulging yourself on a simple but very tasty menu full of wholesome food. Fairly priced.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Superb food, never disappointed with the menu, every option is delicious! Great atmosphere and lovely people working there - one of our absolute favourite spots in Amsterdam!

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Best service I've encountered in Amsterdam, coupled with good food, nice selection of drinks, and a peaceful pontoon terrace by the water. Street-side terrace is quite noisy.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Fantastic food!  Enjoyed a breakfast and dinner there on the recommendation of a neighbor.  Had the Angus burger for dinner.  The staff was friendly and made great recommendations.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Its a quaint little cafe with a cozy ambience that invites you in for some really good breakfast and coffee.  Loved the sandwiches  i tried there. The goat cheese pumpkin sandwich as well as the chicken avacado sandwich.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Fast and friendly service. Great terrace along the canal, really good burgers. Highly recommend!

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Great place to chill with a beer or having a casual dinner. Especially when the terrace is open in the summer. One of the few places who has the longest sun on the terrace.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Good (and regularly updated) selection of draft and bottled beers. Plenty of outdoor seating, including on the canal. Nice place for sunny days.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Amazing place. Great lunch options. Also for vegetarians and vegans. And in the evening a drink is also possible

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Wonderful diner with most amazing waiter serving the best sweet potato and goats cheese ever. Lovely ambient corner of Amsterdam worth a visit.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: In summer a great terrace outside next to the water. The inside is fairly small but ensures a cosy environment with proper food and a nice selection of beers and wines

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Very nice locals bar and restaurant. Staff is friendly, food is good and they have nice beers. Great terrace on sunny days

Name: Radijs
Review Text:
Nice canal-side terrace and friendly service.
Their pulled pork sandwich was also really good.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Very cozy place, nice food and kind service. In spring/summer they have an outside space next to the canal but the space gets full quickly. Suggested.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: If you are vegetarian you will be happy there. Menu is not very big but the food is delicious. Salads are pretty big size.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Absoluut love the place! Amazing food and friendly helpful staff.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Simple place. Nice atmosphere. I tried the dutch sausage sandwich. It was a little messy but quite good.  The coffee was delicious.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: The food was scrumptious! Ambient vibes, relaxed but attentive wait staff. Great spot for a bite

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Great atmosphere, burgers (veggie and radijs) were both great. The veggie was delicious, and much much better compared to other burgers of this type I ate.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Excellent food and drinks, nice staff and a great place to enjoy some sun, whenever possible!

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Perfect place for a beer next to the canal ;)

Name: Radijs
Review Text: In general a bit dirty and not taking good care of that. The food nothing really special, bad bread and nothing outstanding. Quite pricey for what you get.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Friendly staff, nice food variety of hot and cold drinks

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Nice and cosy place. The design is industrial and the food is nice and very fresh. Welcoming environment. Will definitely visit again.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Super good food. A lil bit slow the service but the place is comfortable enough to help the wait.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Delicious food with good beers! (But the banana orange strawberry smoothie just tasted like orange, that's too bad)

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Nice restaurant with a terrace next to the canal. Love the food. I come here regularly for lunch.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Amazing food with a varied menu. The staff are really friendly and accommodating- would recommend.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Inside a bit small, but if the weather allows it a great spot to sit outside. Nice food and perfect for a drink.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Typical hip spot in Amsterdam - terrace gets a lot of sun in the afternoon, so you can just sit down, put your sunglasses on and drink a nice local beer.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Excellent food,good price and friendly and helpful staff. Highly recommend.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Lovely brunch spot. Would recommend the Brie and Honey toasie. Good Lattee too! Thanks again.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Really friendly staff and enjoyable atmosphere. I liked the Oedipus Thai Thai beer and the samosas.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Cute place in West for a bite or drink. Nice big terrace at the water

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Good service. Nice atmosphere. Simple menu but still good food. Good location.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Had a nice lunch with my bf there, the customers who seated next to us just been a bit loud

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Nice service! And good food. Also perfect for drinks in the summer

Name: Radijs
Review Text:
Very nice place but in October..
sitting on wood out(no pillows,no blanket...)is something to consider ‚ò∫

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Lovely location and decor. Eggs Florentine and chai latte were both great!

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Nice restaurant with good choice of beers and other drinks. Great staff.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Very nice food at very reasonable prices! Totally recommend for a nice brunch or lunch!

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Cosy cafe with excellent food and drinks menu. Definitely recommend for a local taste of Amsterdam.

Name: Radijs
Review Text: Good choice of food and drinks + massive terrace and nice staff

Name: Radijs
